about_the_game:
Step into a vibrant pixel-art world where strategy and creativity collide! In this city-building deck-building game, every card is a piece of your puzzle. Place buildings on a dynamic hexagonal grid, optimize your resource generation, and manage prices to maximize your profits.

Hexagonal City-Building: Place cards strategically to create a thriving city, balancing resources like Wheat, Meat, Metal, and Products. And upgrade your city with houses, shops, and factories to boost resource production and create powerful combos.

  • Deck-Building Progression: Buy cards from a shop or select random rewards after each level to customize your deck and refine your strategy.

Buy Relics for Global Upgrades: Unlock powerful global upgrades that enhance your abilities and provide game-changing effects.

Master the balance between resource generation, economic growth, and powerful upgrades to expand your city and unlock new challenges. Will you build the ultimate city?
